extendedInfo.description: People of Leb is an innovative application that allows you to easily discover unique information about Lebanese people worldwide.Hence, it enables you to view peopleâs basic information ( such as: age, religion, parents, place of birth etc..), biography, photos, quotes and different milestones in their lives ( graduation, marriage, occupation etcâ¦) .Also, itâs the first Lebanese platform that provides social media activity statistics, such as: most influential Lebanese tweeps, charts about daily activity, most liked Lebanese facebook  pages etcâ¦Finally, People of Leb allows you to view the daily List of Lebanese people born on this day. So after today, you will never forget to send your best wishes to your closest friends and family members.Main features:â¢	Easily search for Lebanese people while on the go.â¢	Find unique information about millions of Lebanese: age, family members, biography, photos, twitter & facebook activity etcâ¦â¢	Explore Lebanese people in organized categories (i.e: Presidents, Ministers,  Doctors, Lawyers, car experts etcâ¦).â¢	Discover peopleâs influence on social media and view their ranking on different social networks.â¢	Track your progress on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram and other social networks through graphical charts.â¢	Read and share prominent Lebanese quotes.â¢	Find old friends, acquaintances and relatives you never knew you had.â¢	Access the daily birthday list of Lebanese people.â¢	Share your favorite content on Facebook, Twitter etc....People of Leb â All about Lebanese !

reviews.title: Problem
reviews.comment: There is a problem at startup after last update
reviews.author: Emile Abou Sawan

reviews.comment: Looks like a nice little toy. Nothing serious.
reviews.author: Hussein Sharafeddin

reviews.title: Bug Fix Plz
reviews.comment: When i search for a name + family name , it search name OR family name instead of \"name + family name \" so please fix because it will give unwanted results
reviews.author: Hady Akiki

reviews.comment: Reinstalled but leaving it on update mode drained my battery many many many times! God!\tIt is stuck on \"Updating, please wait...\" knowing that it went on update mode without asking for permission! I used it once, and I still think it is a good app... any recommendation?
reviews.author: Samir Saati

reviews.title: not as good as it says
reviews.comment: i don\'t think this is the same app as the one i heard abt for iphone. first, i could not see an demographic statistics, obtuaries, etc... what the app promises in the description is different from whats inside, which is very misleading and really bad to do. second, the app is very unstable, too slow and forces close often. ive been waiting for it to be on android, and all i got is a fake copy.
reviews.author: Oussama Fakih

reviews.title: Very nice lebanese app
reviews.comment: I have found everyone I have searched for
reviews.author: Hassib Abou Dargham

reviews.title: Display Not working
reviews.comment: I have a Samsung Galaxy S2 and this app does not display correctly the information. Please fix
reviews.author: Pierre Boulos

reviews.title: Very Good App
reviews.comment: This is a very good app. I have seen it before on my friends iPhone and always wondered why its not on Android. Good move. Design can be improved.
reviews.author: Tarek Abi Mosleh

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: IT\'S NOT WORKING... UPDATING ALL THE TIME  PLEASE FIX IT
reviews.author: Micho Khoury

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: It\'s a very good app . But some info need to be apdated . And sometime info don\'t show up , and keep showing : loading please wait ....
reviews.author: Michel Saliba

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Best app for statistical, specially for our lebanese famous, but design can be improved.
reviews.author: Mohamad Zeineldin

reviews.title: Privacy!!!
reviews.comment: What is the point of having everyone\'s names, birth place and birth dates on the app? this is a breach of privacy. now you are making it much easier to steal someone\'s identity and impersonate them! I want you to remove my information  from your database right now! Banks here ask for your date of birth to confirm your identity, well done you screwed up the whole system just for the sake of being lebanese!
reviews.author: bassem nasser
